title: input[type="image"] element
description: The input element represents either an image from which a user can select a coordinate and submit the form, or alternatively a button from which the user can submit the form.

examples: A screen reader might announce the button as something like "<name>, button".
Voice control software will let the user say something like "click <name>" to activate the control.
A screen reader might be announce the role as something like "button".
Voice control software will let the user say something like "click button" or flag the role with a number.
